item.title: How to Detect and Prevent Click Through Rate Manipulation
item.dc:creator: ctradmin
item.description: Exposing click-through rate manipulation is crucial for any online business looking to have authentic data on their website’s performance. This deceptive practice involves artificially inflating the number of clicks on a link or ad to mislead advertisers or search engines. By learning the signs and implementing preventive measures, you can safeguard your website’s credibility and […]
item.content:encoded:
Exposing click-through rate manipulation is crucial for any online business looking to have authentic data on their website’s performance. This deceptive practice involves artificially inflating the number of clicks on a link or ad to mislead advertisers or search engines. By learning the signs and implementing preventive measures, you can safeguard your website’s credibility and ensure accurate…
